entry.title: How to detect Phishing URLs using PySpark Decision Trees - PyCon India 2015
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Hitesh Dharmdasani

Credential theft via use of Phishing Pages form a bulk of common-man-incidents in todays Information Security landscape. This talk is aimed at looking at ways to detect Phishing pages by leveraging large quantities of previously seen phishing pages and using machine learning algorithms to predict future …
entry.content:
Description

Speaker: Hitesh Dharmdasani

Credential theft via use of Phishing Pages form a bulk of common-man-incidents in todays Information Security landscape. This talk is aimed at looking at ways to detect Phishing pages by leveraging large quantities of previously seen phishing pages and using machine learning algorithms to predict future phishing pages with a high degree of accuracy.

Details: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/pycon-india-2015/proposals/how-to-detect-phishing-urls-using-pyspark-decision-trees/

entry.content:
Description

Panel Discussion: Diversity in Cybersecurity

Panel Members: - Vandana Verma - Shira Shamban - Hitesh Dharmdasani - Judy Ngure

PyCon India is the largest gathering of Pythonistas in India for the Python programming language. The 13th edition of PyCon India took place online from 17th Sept to 20th Sept 2021.

Talk Detail: https://in.pycon.org/blog/2021/diversity-in-cybersecurity-panel-discussion.html

Click here to subscribe to the PyCon India channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/inpycon?sub_confirmation=1 Follow PyCon India on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconindia Follow PyCon India on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PyConIndia/
